flawed_nl_solution:
The federal government takes out 1/3*450=<<1/3*450=150>>150 dollars.
The state takes out 0.08*450=<<0.08*450=36>>36 dollars.
Then the final amount remaining after all the deductions are removed is 450-150-36-50-20-10=<<450-150-36-50-20-10=187>>187 dollars
#### 187

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 184, not 187. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
